statements: SELECT * FROM message;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM message WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, timestamp, message_text FROM message WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM message GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_id, receiver_id FROM message;
SELECT * FROM message ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM message WHERE sender_id=3 OR receiver_id=5
SELECT * FROM message WHERE sender_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND receiver_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM message WHERE receiver_id = 5 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM message ORDER BY message_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM instructors;
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name FROM instructors ORDER BY instructor_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id > 3 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT instructor_name FROM instructors WHERE LENGTH(instructor_name) > 10;
SELECT student_name AS Name, student_id AS ID FROM students WHERE student_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM students JOIN instructors ON students.student_id = instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrolled_courses FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT instructor_name, teaching_courses FROM instructors WHERE teaching_courses @> ARRAY['Math', 'Physics'];
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT message_text FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DiscussionForums WHERE creator_id = 3;
SELECT instructor_name FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM Instructors ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT forum_name, creator_id FROM DiscussionForums WHERE creator_id = 2;
SELECT message_text FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 3 AND receiver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT discussion_topic, created_at FROM discussions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT student_name FROM students WHERE student_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT instructor_name FROM instructors;
SELECT * FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT student_name, instructor_name FROM students s JOIN student_instructor_mapping m ON s.student_id = m.student_id JOIN instructors i ON m.instructor_id = i.instructor_id;
